summary: Dealing with nuclear testing and its deadly effects, the story portrays Boy, a young widower living in the desert on a nuclear testing site. Living as a hermit, he waits for the end of the world.
cast: River Phoenix|Judy Davis|Jonathan Pryce|Karen Black|T. Dan Hopkins|Lorne Miller|Julius Drum|John Trudell|Rodney A. Grant|George Aguilar|Stephen Silberkraus
keywords: two word title|star died before release|unfinished movie|desert|nuclear testing
title: Dark Blood
